funcDescRest: for a given amount of time with given speed for each wheel.
funcPara: The function gets 5 parameters: FL wheel speed(-100 to 100) FR wheel speed(-100 to 100) BL wheel speed(-100 to 100) BR wheel speed(-100 to 100) all in rounds per minute to set the speed of each wheel and time in seconds(1-100) to set the amount of time.

funcDescStart: Makes the LEDs of the robot blink
funcDescRest: to the color you enter for a given amount of time.
funcPara: The function gets 4 parameters: R(0-255) B(0-255) G(0-255) to indicate the color and time in seconds(1-100) to set the amount of time.

funcDescStart: Commands the robot to shoot once.

funcPara: The function gets the the custom command as a parameter.

funcDescStart: Changes the LEDs of the robot when it's executing
funcDescRest: commands based on your choice from the Color Options view.
funcPara: The function gets the R(0-255) B(0-255) G(0-255) from the TextFields or from what you will click in the picture. You can also take a picture to use instead.

funcDescStart: Saving the program the user wrote
Loads the programs the user wrote
funcDescRest: from the firebase and allowing the user to keep working on it.
